I suspect this is due to the problems fixed in bug 117928.  Can you please try with a build after 1126 and see if this problem goes away?
*** Bug 118577 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Please re-open if you see this in a newer build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 117928 ***
